existing_features.title: Add click navigation to GiftPackCard component so that clicking anywhere on the card navigates to a detail page for that gift pack
Create a new gift pack detail page route that displays comprehensive information about a single gift pack including all images, full description, pricing details, and add-to-cart functionality
Register the new detail page route in the router configuration with the pattern '/gift-pack/:id' where :id is the gift pack identifier

new_feature_requests.summary: Make gift pack tiles clickable to open detail page

projectName: Make gift pack tiles clickable to open detail page
